channel.title: espnW presents Be Honest with Cari Champion
channel.description: Cari Champion takes an honest look at the world of sports and pop culture with the help of outspoken guests.

item.title: Dear Black Athlete
item.description: Dear Black Athlete is a series of conversations tackling the challenges of being a professional athlete while being Black in America's social climate. Led by Cari Champion, the special features letters and discussion from notable civic leaders and sports figures.
item.itunes:title: Dear Black Athlete
item.itunes:author: ESPN, ESPNW, Cari Champion

item.title: Staying Power: Nunes & Ansaroff
item.description: First female Brazilian UFC Champion Amanda Nunes joins Cari Champion to discuss how she beat Ronda Rousey in 48 seconds and why she's here to stay. Plus, her girlfriend, UFC Fighter Nina Ansaorff joins the conversation to discuss the culture of same-sex relationships in the UFC .

item.itunes:subtitle: Cari Champion talks to Kings F Caron Butler about the immense challenges he's dealt with in life, from the streets to the NBA, and how he overcame them to become the success story he is today. Plus, there's hope for the Lakers after all!
